title: (x) Wood or hand typeface used in British 1920s silent film - hand lettered {Robert Trogman}
content:
Looking to match this typeface, as closely as possible. Any ideas?  
Thanks for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lear.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419133813/http:/typophile.com/files/lear.jpg) | 135.81 KB |
author: andy goldman

comments.content:
ANDY  
Your sample is hand lettered.

Thanks Robert, I thought it might be hand lettered, but based on a recognizable sans serif typeface from that period.  
Is there anything you know of that might come close to this lettering?
